name: Thrombolytic(t-PA)Therapy
title: Thrombolytic (t-PA) Therapy
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent medications that are prescribed for thrombolytic (t-PA) therapy for treatment of ischemic stroke.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Medication. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are administered appropriate thrombolytic (t-PA) therapy for stroke.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with RxNorm thrombolytic medications appropriate for stroke treatment consistent with administration by intravenous (IV) route.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
